activities: We sell products and subscriptions on behalf of owners and publishers of websites and print publications. In order to enable those sales, we may collect personal information from the EU such as the name, e-mail address, mailing address, phone number, or credit card information of the customer.  Other data may be collected from users of our websites or platform.  We may also collect personal information from business contacts or employees in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, and manually processed data
recoursemech: Private sector developed dispute resolution mechanisms that incorporate the Safe Harbor framework - TRUSTe
